Georg Adam Keyser, Allgemeines Verzeichnis der Bucher welche in der Frankfurter und Leipziger Ostermesse des 1779 Jahres entweder ganz neu gedruckt oder sonst verbessert wieder angelegt worden sind, auch inskunf- tige noch herauskommen sollen (Leipzig: M. G. Weidmanns Erben, 1779), 735, 778, 812.

Five unpublished letters written by Charlotte von Hezel to Zapf, and two unpublished letters from Hezel's husband to Zapf, are preserved among Zapf's correspondence. Zapf's papers are located at the Staats-und Stadtbibliothek Augsburg (Zapf Briefwechsel).

I discuss Hezel's letters to Zapf in more detail in "Das Wochenblatt fur's schone Geschlecht: A Sociohistorical and Literary Analysis of an Eighteenth-Century Periodical for Women" (Ph.D. diss., University of Michigan, 1995), esp. 74-76, 121-23 self-citation

Hezel reviewed fifty-nine publications, including plays, novels, and other periodicals. I discuss four of the reviews in "Charlotte von Hezel and Das Wochenblatt fur's schone Geschecht: An Eighteenth-Century Challenge to Gender and Genre," Women in German Yearbook 14 (1998): 71-89. self-citation
